title: Sun opposition Mars
summary: A polarity between intention and action expressed through external pressure. Motivation meets resistance, often via other people or situational demands. The opportunity is to respond with clarity rather than react defensively.

meaning.headline: Your direction is tested by external resistance.

frames.text: Sun-Mars oppositions highlight moments where assertion meets challenge, often surfacing through conflict, competition, or opposing agendas.
This aspect asks for conscious response rather than reflexive reaction when momentum is interrupted.
Pressure from others can clarify where motivation is strongest.
Tension increases when effort is mirrored back as resistance.
This guarantees conflict, anger, or confrontation.

opportunities: Learning when to push and when to pivot

reusable_lines.text: Opposition tests how you respond under pressure.
Strength shows in response, not reaction.

allowed_framing: Agency-forward framing: 'you can choose how to respond...'
Contextual framing: 'if resistance shows up through others...'

sources: Sun-Mars opposition as will/force polarity archetype
